Reference

All functions

addCentroids()

Add group centroid location to an existing plot

addRecaptures()

Add recapture locations to an existing plot

addStations()

Add receiver stations to an existing plot

animateTracks()

Animate the RSP tracks

calcRSP()

Recreating RSP for a particular tracked animal

dynBBMM()

Total dynamic Brownian Bridge Movement Model

getAreaStep()

Calculate dBBMM and overlapping areas in steps

getAreas()

Calculate water areas per group or track

getCentroids()

Get centroid locations of dBBMM

getDistPoint()

Calculate in-water distances from RSP locations to a point of reference

getDistances()

Get total distances travelled

getOverlaps()

Calculate overlaps between different groups

includeRSP()

Recreating RSP for all tracked animals

nameTracks()

Identify potential fine-scale data for analysis

plotAreas()

Plot areas

plotContours()

Plot dynamic Brownian Bridge Movement Model (dBBMM) contours

plotDensities()

Density plot of elapsed times between consecutive acoustic detections

plotDistances()

Plot total distances travelled

plotOverlaps()

Plot overlapping contours

plotRaster()

Check input data quality for the RSP analysis

plotTracks()

Plot the RSP tracks

prepareDetections()

Prepare detection data for RSP calculations

runRSP()

Calculate refined shortest paths between detections

suggestSize()

Suggest plot dimensions for a given raster
